trans-unit.source: If you use pycroscopy for research, we would appreciate if you could cite our Arxiv paper titled “USID and Pycroscopy - Open frameworks for storing and analyzing spectroscopic and imaging data”
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用显微镜检查法进行研究，请参考Arxiv论文“ USID和显微镜检查法-用于存储和分析光谱和成像数据的开放框架” ，我们将不胜感激。

trans-unit.source: Please visit our homepage for more information and installation instructions.
trans-unit.target: 请访问我们的主页以获取更多信息和安装说明。

trans-unit.source: Python library for scientific analysis of microscopy data
trans-unit.target: 用于科学分析显微镜数据的Python库

trans-unit.source: pycroscopy is a python package for image processing and scientific analysis of imaging modalities such as multi-frequency scanning probe microscopy, scanning tunneling spectroscopy, x-ray diffraction microscopy, and transmission electron microscopy. pycroscopy uses a data-centric model wherein the raw data collected from the microscope, results from analysis and processing routines are all written to standardized hierarchical data format (HDF5) files for traceability, reproducibility, and provenance.
trans-unit.target: pycroscopy是一个python软件包，用于图像处理和科学分析成像方式，例如多频扫描探针显微镜，扫描隧道光谱，x射线衍射显微镜和透射电子显微镜。支气管镜检查使用以数据为中心的模型，其中将从显微镜收集的原始数据，分析和处理例程的结果全部写入标准化的分层数据格式（HDF5）文件，以实现可追溯性，可重复性和出处。
